metadata.synopsis: The players enter the Astral Prison to find a small group ofSilver Swords mopping up a group of intellect devourers. They spot the players and attack them!
metadata.how_to_trigger: Enter the Astral Prison during Intermezzo.

0.speaker: High Gish'ra Sh'ari
0.text: Friend of ghaik - you will be cleansed!
